Who WE ARE ?

Faceify provides some interesting services which are related to the face recognition mechanism, like(take attendance of students, detect the strangers in a company, counting the presence people, ...etc.)

WHY US?

We save your time


All services are free

Full secure data

OUR GOALS

Facilitate the process of taking attendance.

Make it easy for teacher to review the history of class.

Make the taking attendance process reliable.

Reduce the time needed to take the attendance.

OUR TEAM

Mhd Saad Eddin

Full Stack Developer

Mazen Al Samman
